title: DINKY The Crooked Little Cow
description: DINKY The Crooked Little Cow is a book based on the lives of Dinky, a special little cow, her best friend, a Canadian Goose named Goosey, and many other farm friends. Dinky is a special little cow for many reasons. She is extra small and her neck and front legs are a little on the crooked side. Come and join Dinky and her many farm friends in their many adventures on the farm.
author: Leah J.  Smith
